title: Linear and rotational motion - people on disk

content.question:
Two people are sitting on a large metal disk at a park. Person <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is halfway between the center and the edge, while Person <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> is at the edge of the disk, as shown. The disk accelerates from rest until it reaches an angular velocity of <math alttext="omega sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></mstyle></math>.
